top.title: US sanctions six more ships after seizing oil tanker off Venezuela
top.summary: The White House plans to move the tanker to a US port and seize the oil on board, a move Caracas has labelled as an act of "international piracy".

top.title: Tricked, abducted and abused: Inside China's schools for 'rebellious' teens
top.summary: Young people tell the BBC that military-style schools deceive and abuse students they claim to help.

top.title: Chief of S Korea's high-stakes exam quits over 'insane' English test
top.summary: Some critics say the questions were unnecessarily complex, while others argue that's their intended purpose.

top.title: Crypto fraudster sentenced for 'epic' $40bn stablecoin crash
top.summary: In August, Do Kwon pleaded guilty to conspiracy to defraud and wire fraud and apologised for his actions.

top.title: OpenAI makes $1bn deal to bring Disney characters to ChatGPT and Sora
top.summary: The agreement will let fans generate videos and images of more than 200 Disney characters.

top.title: Reddit launches High Court challenge to Australia's social media ban for kids
top.summary: It said the landmark policy has serious implications for Australians' privacy and political rights.

title.#text: The next Star Wars game is the spiritual successor to Knights of the Old Republic
Trump signs AI executive order pushing to ban state laws
